00011 struct SockRecord {

00017   int           fromApp;

00026              const Buffer     &bi,

00032              const int        &frn,

00034              const int        &fen);
00035   virtual ~SockRecord() {}

00038   friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const SockRecord& L) {

00043 struct SockStatus {
00044   SockRecord sockArray[NUM_SOCKS];
00045 
00046   int FindFreeSock();                          // Return the first free socket,
00047                                                //   or -1 if no socket is
00048                                                //   available.
00049 
00050   void CloseSocket(unsigned sock) {            // Close the specified socket.
00051     sockArray[sock] = SockRecord(); }
00052 
00053   int FindConnection(const Connection & c);    // Find a socket which matches
00054                                                //   this connection, return
00055                                                //   its fd or -1 if no socket
00056                                                //   matches.

00058                                                // Find a socket which matches
00059                                                //   this connection and is
00060                                                //   waiting to complete its
00061                                                //   connection.  Return its fd
00062                                                //   or -1 if no socket matches.

00064     return (&sockArray[sock].connection); }    //   specified socket.

00075                                                //   specified socket.

00092     return (sockArray[sock].blocking); }       //   set non-blocking, 1 if it
00093                                                //   is set to block.
00094   int SetBlockingStatus (unsigned sock, int b);// Set the blocking status for
00095                                                //   the specified socket.
00096 
00097   int GetReadNotificationStatus (unsigned sock) {
00098     return (sockArray[sock].forward_read_notification); }
00099                                                // Returns 1 if we have been
00100                                                //   asked to notify the
00101                                                //   application layer the next
00102                                                //   time this socket is
00103                                                //   available for reading, 0
00104                                                //   otherwise.

00143                    unsigned sockfd);           //   available port for the
00144                                                //   specified ip.  Assign the

00146                                                //   socket.  Return -1 on

00149                                                //   a given port on the

00152                                                //   unassigned.  Return -1 on
00153                                                //   failure

00156                                                //   -1 on failure.
